summary: Item 1. BUSINESS OVERVIEW The Cigna Group SM , together with its subsidiaries (either individually or collectively referred to as the "Company," "we," "us" or "our"), is a global health company. Our Purpose and Mission The Cigna Group is a global health company committed to creating a better future for every individual and every community. We relentlessly challenge ourselves to partner and innovate solutions for better health. Powered by our people and our brands, we advance our mission to improve the health and vitality of those we serve.
